name: Pumki & The Squash King
description:
In a land far away, a hero awakens. After his ten-year rest, Pumki emerges from his slumber - only to find out that the Squash King has enslaved and taken over all of Gourdia! Will Pumki be able to rescue Gourdia from the Evil Squash King? Only time will tell.

Made for the Metroidvania Jam.

SPACE - JUMP.

HOLD S + SPACE - SUPER JUMP.

X - ATTACK.

A - D - LEFT & RIGHT.
